text: Fabio Gerli (born 23 December 1996) is an Italian footballer who plays for Modena. ==Club career== On 25 August 2020 he joined Modena. ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Footballers from Rome Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Italy youth international footballers Category:Virtus Entella players Category:Santarcangelo Calcio players Category:Bassano Virtus 55 S.T. players Category:Robur Siena players Category:Modena F.C. players Category:Serie B players Category:Serie C players
title: Fabio Gerli
